pages.title: Drone
pages.text: The Drone is an autonomous automated assistant. Once deployed, it bonds with its owner and performs various tasks using $(l:logicore:architecture/cycles)Cycles$(). It requires a $(l:logicore:machines/drone_bay)Drone Bay$() nearby to recharge.

pages.title: Behavior & Upkeep
pages.text: The Drone will follow its owner and automatically heal them when injured, consuming stored $(l:logicore:architecture/cycles)Cycles$().$(br)$(br)When its internal storage runs low, it will automatically return to its assigned $(l:logicore:machines/drone_bay)Drone Bay$() to recharge before resuming duties.

pages.title: Deployment
pages.text: To activate a Drone, right-click it onto a block near a $(l:logicore:machines/drone_bay)Drone Bay$().$(br)$(br)$(l)Customization:$()$(br)Renaming the Drone Item in an Anvil before placing it will give the entity a permanent name tag.
Combines advanced mobility with a processor unit for autonomous logic.
